DataElement.preferredName: Health Utilities Index During Past Week Pain or Discomfort Status
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Response about a subject's pain or discomfort experienced during the past week.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Health Utilities Index During Past Week Pain or Discomfort
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A family of generic health profiles and preference-based systems for measuring health status, reporting health-related quality of life, and producing utility scores._At some point in a given period of time._The most recent week. May include the present day._A question about an individual's pain or discomfort.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A family of generic health profiles and preference-based systems for measuring health status, reporting health-related quality of life, and producing utility scores.

Concepts.definition: A family of generic health profiles and preference-based systems for measuring health status, reporting health-related quality of life, and producing utility scores.

Property.preferredName: During Past Week Pain or Discomfort
Property.preferredDefinition: At some point in a given period of time.:The most recent week. May include the present day.:A question about an individual's pain or discomfort.

Concepts.definition: At some point in a given period of time.
The most recent week. May include the present day.
A question about an individual's pain or discomfort.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

ValueDomain.preferredName: Health Utilities Index Pain or Discomfort Status
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Status of an individual's pain or discomfort experienced during the past week.

PermissibleValues.value: Severe pain or discomfort.  Pain not relieved by drugs and constantly disrupted normal activities
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Severe Pain or Discomfort; Pain not Relieved by Drugs; Constant Disruption of Normal Activities

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Severe Pain or Discomfort; Pain not Relieved by Drugs; Constant Disruption of Normal Activities
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual has or had severe pain or discomfort that was not relieved by drugs and constantly disrupted normal activities.

Concepts.longName: Severe Pain or Discomfort; Pain not Relieved by Drugs; Constant Disruption of Normal Activities
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual has or had severe pain or discomfort that was not relieved by drugs and constantly disrupted normal activities.

PermissibleValues.value: Frequent pain or discomfort; frequent disruption of normal activities. Discomfort required prescription narcotics for relief
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Frequent Pain or Discomfort; Relief Requires Prescription Narcotics; Frequent Disruption of Normal Activities

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Frequent Pain or Discomfort; Relief Requires Prescription Narcotics; Frequent Disruption of Normal Activities
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual has or had frequent pain or discomfort that required prescription narcotics for relief, with frequent disruption of normal activities.

Concepts.longName: Frequent Pain or Discomfort; Relief Requires Prescription Narcotics; Frequent Disruption of Normal Activities
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual has or had frequent pain or discomfort that required prescription narcotics for relief, with frequent disruption of normal activities.

PermissibleValues.value: Frequent pain or discomfort.  Discomfort relieved by oral medicines with occasional disruption of normal activities
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Frequent Pain or Discomfort; Relief from Oral Medicines; Occasional Disruption of Normal Activities

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Frequent Pain or Discomfort; Relief from Oral Medicines; Occasional Disruption of Normal Activities
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual has or had frequent pain or discomfort that was relieved by oral medicines, with occasional disruption of normal activities.

Concepts.longName: Frequent Pain or Discomfort; Relief from Oral Medicines; Occasional Disruption of Normal Activities
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual has or had frequent pain or discomfort that was relieved by oral medicines, with occasional disruption of normal activities.

PermissibleValues.value: Occasional pain or discomfort.  Discomfort relieved by non-prescription drugs or self-control activity without disruption of normal activities
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Occasional Pain or Discomfort; Relief from Non-prescription Drugs or Activity; No Disruption of Normal Activities

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Occasional Pain or Discomfort; Relief from Non-prescription Drugs or Activity; No Disruption of Normal Activities
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual has or had occasional pain or discomfort that was relieved by non-prescription drugs or self-control activities, without disruption of normal activities.

Concepts.longName: Occasional Pain or Discomfort; Relief from Non-prescription Drugs or Activity; No Disruption of Normal Activities
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual has or had occasional pain or discomfort that was relieved by non-prescription drugs or self-control activities, without disruption of normal activities.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual has or had no pain or discomfort.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual has or had no pain or discomfort.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A condition or state at a particular time.

Concepts.definition: A condition or state at a particular time.

ValueDomain.origin: HUI:Health Utilities Index; Feeny et al., Health Utilities Index Chapter 26 In Bert Spilker, ed. Quality of Life and Pharmacoeconomics in Clinical Trials. Second Edition. Philadelphia: Lippincott-Raven Press, 1996, pp 239-252.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Which one of the following be
ReferenceDocuments.description: Which one of the following best describes the pain or discomfort the subject has experienced during the past week?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF TEXT 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Which one of the following best describes the pain or discomfort you have experienced during the past week?

DataElement.origin: HUI:Health Utilities Index; Feeny et al., Health Utilities Index Chapter 26 In Bert Spilker, ed. Quality of Life and Pharmacoeconomics in Clinical Trials. Second Edition. Philadelphia: Lippincott-Raven Press, 1996, pp 239-252.
